Judul: Three-craft gravity-wave mission gets green light: Success of LISA Pathfinder test satellite paves way for full-scale experiment.
Abstrak:
Europe’s gravitational-wave hunters are celebrating. On 1 July, a satellite will wrap up its mission to test technology for the pioneering quest to measure gravitational ripples in the stillness of space. Over the past
year, the craft has performed much better than many had hoped. That success has convinced the European Space Agency (ESA) to give the go-ahead to a full-scale version able to sense
Fakultas: Fakultas Matematika dan Ilmu Pengetahuan Alam
